resultset.statement: select w.sensitive_name,s.name,COUNT(w.user_id) as num , DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL - (DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE()) - 1) DAY) AS startData, CURDATE() AS endDate from behavior_sensitive_word_report w LEFT JOIN sys_user s on s.user_id =w.user_id where sensitive_source LIKE 'com.tencent.mobileqq' and sensitive_name = '1893' AND use_date >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL - (DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE()) - 1) DAY) GROUP BY w.user_id ORDER BY num desc limit 20
